default.title: LR Mourão | Welder Training and Technical Coordination in Leiria
default.description: Specialized center in Leiria (Central Region). Welder training, procedure qualification (WPS/WPQR), welding coordination (ISO 3834, EN 1090), and industrial certification.
default.keywords: LR Mourão, Welding Training, Welding Coordination, Welding Course Leiria, ISO 3834, EN 1090, Welder Certification, Consulting, Inspection, Welding, Central Region
default.ogDescription: Specialized center in Leiria. Welder training, technical coordination, and industrial certification (ISO 3834, EN 1090). Complete solutions for your company.

index.title: LR Mourão | Welder Training and Welding Coordination

jsonLd.name: LR Mourão - Welding Training & Coordination
jsonLd.description: Excellence center in Leiria (Central Region) for Welder Training (TIG, MIG/MAG, MMA), Welding Coordination (EN ISO 14731), and Industrial Certification (EN 1090, ISO 3834).

hero.subtitle: Complete solutions in training, certification, and welding coordination for modern industry.

services.title: Services
services.description: Complete and certified solutions for all your welding and industrial coordination needs

formacao.title: Welding Training
formacao.description: We train professional workforce that meets the needs of the national and international market. Dynamic, tailored courses and excellence in training.
formacao.alloys: Carbon Steel, Stainless Steel, Aluminum, Copper
formacao.certification: EN ISO 9606, ASME IX, AWS D1.1

coordenacao.title: Coordination
coordenacao.description: Specialist in coordination according to EN 1090 and ISO 3834.
responsibilities: Select and/or approve welding processes suitable for material and application (TIG, MAG, MMA, etc.).
Validate and control WPS (Welding Procedure Specifications).
Define and supervise procedure qualification (WPQR) and welder/operator qualification.
Choose base and filler materials (see EN ISO 15608, 2560, 14341, etc.).
Determine shielding gases, polarities, welding positions, electrical parameters, and heat treatments.

consultadoria.title: Consulting
consultadoria.description: Advice for business evolution in all technical and normative areas.

inspecao.title: Inspection and Control
inspecao.description: Quality assurance through rigorous inspections and process control.
items: Visual inspection EN ISO 17637 and ISO 5817

certificacao.title: Certification
certificacao.description: Complete support in obtaining and maintaining essential certifications.
items: Company certification EN 1090, EN ISO 9606, ISO 3834, and EN 15614
Welder certification EN ISO 9606, ASME IX, AWS D1.1
Complete process: from preparation to audit

advantages.title: Advantages of
advantages.description: Over {{years}} years of experience in the Welding Training, Certification, and Coordination sector

list.title: Qualified Team
list.text: Direct monitoring by European Welding Specialist (EWF/IIW) and EWF Welding Inspector, ensuring grounded technical decisions.

list.title: Practical Experience
list.text: H-L045 certified welder in the three main processes (TIG, MIG/MAG, and MMA) with practical experience that reinforces solution quality.

list.title: Focus on Results
list.text: Focus on efficiency, reliability, and cost reduction, always with a high technical and professional standard. Optimized solutions for your business.

contact.title: Let's work
contact.description: Count on LR Mourão whenever you need. We are here to support, answer, and deliver solutions without complications.
